body: Yeah, we can leave it as `output_mask`, if the "other" mask is never useful. However, what we should do is error if someone tries to name an input parameter `output_mask`, since it will get shadowed by the `output_mask` we autogenerate.
body_html: Yeah, we can leave it as output_mask, if the "other" mask is never useful. However, what we should do is error if someone tries to name an input parameter output_mask, since it will get shadowed by the output_mask we autogenerate.
body_text: Yeah, we can leave it as output_mask, if the "other" mask is never useful. However, what we should do is error if someone tries to name an input parameter output_mask, since it will get shadowed by the output_mask we autogenerate.
